[SyntaxError]: In strict mode code, functions can only be declared at top level or inside a block. (1,25)
1|"use strict"; if (true) function f(){} else function g(){}
 |                       ^

1|"use strict"; if (true) function f(){} else function g(){}
 |                                      ^
